content: / polyamidi 1 sound waves socks 4th size rnds 1 3 knit 52 sts rnds 4 k4 p4 k8 p4 k10 p4 k8 p4 k6 cuff rnds 5 k3 p1 k4 p1 k6 p1 k4 p1 k8 p1 k4 p1 k6 p1 k4 using 4mm dpns cast on 40 44 48 52 sts the pattern has p1 k5 been written for a cast on with straight needles if you wish rnds 6 k2 p1 k6 p1 k4 p1 k6 twice p1 k6 p1 k4 twice to join into the round straight away work row 1 twice and rnds 7 p2 k8 p4 k8 p6 k8 p4 twice omit row 2 rnds 8 14 repeat rounds 1 7 work rib as follows row 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end all sizes row 2 as row 1 knit each round until leg measures 15 15 17 17 cm from cast change to a 3 5mm short circular needle magic loop on edge or length preferred or divide the stitches across dpns and join into a circle place marker you will sew up the small gap where you knitted the first two row later heel flap cont in rib as set for 10 more rounds change to 3 5mm dpns if you are using a short circular needle there is no need to use dpns if you are using magic leg loop you may prefer to place the spare stitches from the top of the foot onto a stitch holder if you are using a short circular knit one round or dpns whilst you work the heel using either the chart or written instructions for your size row 1 k2 sl1p p1 until you have 18 20 22 24 sts on your start at round 1 work rnds 1 7 twice and then knit each round needle sl1p k1 turn 20 22 24 26 sts until leg measures 15 15 17 17 cm from cast on edge row 2 sl1p p1 k1 to last 3 sts p3 turn or length preferred row 3 sl1p k1 sl1p p1 to last 2 sts sl1p k1 turn repeat row 2 3 until heel measures 5 6 7 8 cm or desired length written instructions finishing on row 3 1st size rnds 1 3 knit 40 sts turn heel rnds 4 k3 p3 k7 3 times p3 k4 row 1 sl1p p11 12 13 14 p2tog p1 turn rnds 5 k2 p1 k3 p1 k5 3 times p1 k3 twice row 2 sl1p k5 ssk k1 turn rnds 6 k1 p1 k5 p1 k3 3 times p1 k5 p1 k2 row 3 sl1p p6 p2tog p1 turn rnds 7 p1 k7 p3 3 times k7 p2 row 4 sl1p k7 ssk k1 turn rnds 8 14 repeat rounds 1 7 cont in this way adding 1 st between slip_stitch and ssk or p2tog on each row ie row 5 sl1p p8 p2tog p1 turn 2nd size row 6 sl1p k9 ssk k1 turn etc until
